app.name: BlockOut2
app.short_description: Reimplementation of a classic game Blockout
app.long_description:
Use Wii Remote horizontally
'move block / select character (hall of fame)' : 'DPAD' 'confirm / drop block' : 'MINUS' 'rotate block around X axis counterclockwise' : 'A' 'rotate block around X axis clockwise' : 'A + B' 'rotate block around Y axis counterclockwise' : '1' 'rotate block around Y axis clockwise' : '1 + B' 'rotate block around Z axis counterclockwise' : '2' 'rotate block around Z axis clockwise' : '2 + B' 'pause / resume game' : 'PLUS'
